“I believed the solemn words spoken by the servant of God, and my heart was aggrieved when they were opposed or made the subject of jest. I attended the meetings on Casco street quite frequently, and believed that Jesus was soon to come in the clouds of heaven; but my great anxiety was to be ready to meet him. My mind constantly dwelt 
150
upon the subject of holiness of heart. I longed above all things to obtain this great blessings, and feel that I was entirely accepted of God.
